text: Crescent Mountain is a mountain in Linn County, Oregon. The mountain is located near the junction of U.S 20 and Highway 22. The mountain lies in the Willamette National Forest. The mountain is best known for its hike that leads to the top of the mountain. The top provides views of nearby mountains such as Mt. Jefferson. ==References== Category:Mountains of Oregon Category:Mountains of Linn County, Oregon ==External links== Geological map
title: Crescent Mountain (Oregon)
